name: Super Not
description:
Controls

W,A,S,D - movement

Arrow Keys - shoot

Description

A turn based strategy action game, where the player must defend their pot plant against waves of enemies.

Created in 8 hours, Super Not was made for a student game jam. The requirements were that it needed to be lock step turn based, have something to keep alive and have post processing and a save system.

Unfortunately there is a bug with the post processing, and not showing, and we couldn't get the save system in on time.

Credits

Martyn Evans - Programmer, Artist

Jess McMahon - Programmer, Sound Design

Josh Condoleon - Programmer

Attributions

Sounds from zapsplat.com
